2) The current states of the devices indicate that two of the meross Light Strips are on, while one is off. The dishwasher is off and requires activation. The actionable controls for the meross Light Strips include the ability to turn them on or off, adjust brightness levels, and modify color settings. The dishwasher can be turned on to initiate its cycle, which would then trigger the action to turn on the light by the nightstand once the dishwasher is completed.
